[00:10.44]La da da da dahh
[00:11.45]

[00:15.00]
[00:15.63]La da da da dahh
[00:16.44]
[00:17.03]You know I'm mobbin' with the D R E
[00:18.84]
[00:20.96]You know who's back up in this motherf**ker
[00:23.52]
[00:24.19]What what what what
[00:25.33]So blaze the w**d up then
[00:26.84]Blaze it up blaze it up
[00:28.00]Just blaze that sh*t up ni**a
[00:28.93]Yeah 'sup Snoop
[00:30.47]Top Dogg bite 'em all ni**a burn the sh*t up
[00:33.01]D P G C my ni**a turn that sh*t up
[00:35.35]C P T L B C yeah we hooking back up
[00:37.86]And when they bang this in the club baby you got to get up
[00:40.39]Thug niggas d**g dealers yeah they giving it up
[00:42.98]Lowlife yo' life boy we living it up
[00:45.39]Taking chances while we dancing in the party for sure
[00:47.92]Slip my ho a forty fo' and she got in the back do'
[00:50.43]B**ches looking at me strange but you know I don't care
[00:52.96]Step up in this motherf**ker just a swanging my hair
[00:55.47]B**ch quit talking Crip walk stay down with the set
[00:57.95]Take a bullet with some d**k and take this d**e from this jet
[01:00.58]Out of town put it down for the Father of Rap
[01:02.92]And if yo' a** get cracked b**ch shut yo' trap
[01:05.53]Come back get back that's the part of success
[01:07.97]If you believe in the S you'll be relievin' your stress
[01:10.20]
[01:21.09]La da da da dahhh
[01:22.47]It's the motherf**king D.R.E. Dr. Dre motherf**ker
[01:25.89]La da da da dahhh
[01:26.82]
[01:27.40]You know I'm mobbin' with the D O double G
[01:29.26]

[01:31.82]
[01:32.49]King of the beats you ride to 'em in your Fleet Fleetwood
[01:35.73]Or Coupe DeVille rolling on dubs
[01:36.95]
[01:37.55]How you feeling whoopty whoop ni**a what
[01:39.54]
[01:40.34]Dre and Snoop chronic'd out in the 'llac
[01:42.35]With Doc in the back sippin' on 'gnac
[01:44.33]
[01:45.07]Clip in the strap dipping through hoods what hoods
[01:47.86]Compton Long Beach Inglewood
[01:50.13]South Central out to the westside it's California Love
[01:53.90]This California bud got a ni**a gang of pub
[01:56.39]I'm on one I might bail up in the Century Club
[01:58.96]With my jeans on and my team strong
[02:01.50]Get my drink on and my smoke on

[02:06.66]Loc it's on for the two triple oh
[02:08.48]Coming real it's the next episode

[02:17.43]

[02:24.85]

[02:36.47]

data.trans:
[ti:The Next Episode]
[ar:Dr. Dre]
[al:The 100 Best HipHop Songs Ever]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.22]//
[00:10.44]//
[00:11.45]
[00:12.07]我就是Snoop Dogg
[00:15.00]
[00:15.63]//
[00:16.44]
[00:17.03]你知道我和Dr.Dre一起混
[00:18.84]
[00:20.96]你知道是谁是这儿的老大
[00:23.52]
[00:24.19]什么 什么 什么 什么 
[00:25.33]所以把烟都点起来 
[00:26.84]把烟点着 把烟点着 
[00:28.00]把烟点着兄弟 
[00:28.93]耶 你好么Snoop
[00:30.47]首席的狗哥 威风八面
[00:33.01]兄弟们把烟点着
[00:35.35]长滩 康普顿 我们强强联手
[00:37.86]当夜店响起这首歌 宝贝儿你一定会嗨起来
[00:40.39]匪徒们 **们也会为我欢呼
[00:42.98]你的生活没有方向 我的生活无忧无虑
[00:45.39]像我们这种匪徒 即使在酒吧跳舞也会伺机而动
[00:47.92]所以我把枪给我的姑娘们 她们可以从后门带进来
[00:50.43]**们用奇怪的眼光看我 但我不在乎 
[00:52.96]对我来说 干掉这个妹子就像甩甩头发那么简单
[00:55.47]**闭嘴 是圈儿里人给我来段性感猫步
[00:57.95]尝尝我的子弹 收好这些货
[01:00.58]出城把它带给饶舌之父
[01:02.92]要是被条子们抓住 最好别告发狗爷
[01:05.53]逃离警局是成功的一部分
[01:07.97]如果跟着狗爷混 小康致富不算事儿
[01:10.20]
[01:21.09]//
[01:22.47]我是Dr.Dre
[01:25.89]//
[01:26.82]
[01:27.40]你知道我和Snoop Dogg一起混
[01:29.26]
[01:30.01]离开了老家康普顿的街头
[01:31.82]
[01:32.49]我是作曲之王 你跟着音乐点头 在凯迪拉克里
[01:35.73]或者是你大轮圈的车里
[01:36.95]
[01:37.55]你们怎么想 开破车的条子 
[01:39.54]
[01:40.34]D.O.C在给我撑腰 我们喝着白兰地
[01:42.35]整个街区都听我号令
[01:44.33]
[01:45.07]装备好我的枪 在街上横行霸道 
[01:47.86]康普顿 长岛 罪恶之城
[01:50.13]西部中南的所有城市
[01:53.90]这是来自加州的爱 加州的**把这个哥们变成了夜店杀手
[01:56.39]我要是也来一根 可能会在酒场上拼死一搏
[01:58.96]穿好我的行头 兄弟们气势汹汹 
[02:01.50]喝着我的酒 抽着我的烟 
[02:03.93]然后带个骚货回家
[02:06.66]兄弟们都抽嗨了
[02:08.48]带来最真实的说唱 这就是续集
[02:10.16]
[02:15.26]等着 嘿
[02:17.43]
[02:18.08]送给那些认为我们是懦夫的傻帽们
[02:22.46]
[02:23.14]我们不开玩笑 就算车轮都震掉了我们还是这么嗨
[02:24.85]
[02:25.36]等着 嘿
[02:27.59]
[02:28.11]送给那些太虚伪的傻帽们 请你坐好
[02:32.61]
[02:33.20]希望你准备好欣赏续集了
[02:35.09]//
[02:36.47]
[02:39.94]每天吞云吐雾般的生活
